Description:
IN/SPD141021/01-311959977
You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to the welding fume produced by the arc welding undertaken during shipbuilding processes is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled, in that; you have failed to control exposure to welding fume at the source of production by adequate ventilation systems and appropriate organisational measures.

IN/SPD141021/02-311960456
You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to the welding fume produced by the arc welding undertaken in the fabrication workshop is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled, in that; you have failed to control exposure to welding fume at the source of production by adequate ventilation systems and appropriate organisational measures.
